name: Bulletdancer
description:
Skullies have invaded the kingdom! This is a small grid-based shooter reminiscent of classic arcade games. Slow down time! Eat a plum! Try not to die from your own bullets deflected back at you! 

How high of a score can you manage?

WASD to shoot and hold SPACE to fire.

-WARNING-

This game does include some flashing effects and may not be suitable for everyone as a result.

This was my first ever coding and gaming project. It's far from perfect but I hope you enjoy it!
